response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us, reflecting its high quality, functionality, and the unique features it offers. We believe it could significantly enhance your experience and bring substantial benefits to you. Considering its worth, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at the same price.
